title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Who wants to play Ascension 2 weeks in a row?
I just don't get why they keep queuing Ascension so many times, rather than their most popular game mode, which is URF.
because when urf is out no one plays ranked
GIVE ME MY URF BACK RIOT!
Double Ascension LUL {{item:3632}} {{item:2050}} {{item:3637}} Give us black market brawlers or urf.{{item:3185}}
hello riot this is xbox fishes i think most people wont like ascension 2 weeks in a row its just i like it but might be boring and would like URF or all random urf better thx u
Maybe If people spam urf enough times they'l give it to us! Worth a try XD URF URF URF !!!
